description: Try our easy to follow Tomato Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tomato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
1 small handful fresh coriander, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place the onion, tomatoes, cucumber, chilli and coriander into a bowl and pour over the lemon juice. Season well, cover and allow to stand at room temperature for 1015 minutes.
Before serving, stir to mix well and sprinkle over the chopped nuts. Serve with toasted pappadoms or hot Naan.
For tomato raita to accompany any spiced curry or rice dish, omit the peanuts and the lemon juice. Before serving whisk 200 g natural yoghurt and stir it into the prepared salad just before serving.
